Edges-Rogue -- Male Human Heroic Rogue
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d12-1 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d6 Strength: d4 Vigor: d10
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility (d6 required)
Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6-1 Persuasion: (spi) d4-1 Stealth: (agi) d12-1
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d10-1
Faith: (spi) d4 Shooting: (agi) d6-1
Notice: (sma) d8 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Common
Skill Notes:
Armor Agility Penalty: -1 Agility-linked skills (d6 required)
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Aristocrat: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Armor Restriction: -4 Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Attractive: +1 Performance (attracted target)/+1 Persuasion (attracted target)
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/May attempt Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Fame: +1 Persuasion (influence friendly individuals)
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Lamashtu (Evil)
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 16; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (10 points): Ambidextrous; Aristocrat; Attractive; Danger Sense; Fame; Opportunist; Rapid Shot; Rogue; Trap Sense; Uncanny Reflexes Hindrances: Anemic; Delusional+; Mean Human Abilities: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Rogue: Has Armor Restriction and Sneak Attack features
Delusional+: Frequently acts on a conspiracy belief
Fame: 2x fee from performing
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Trap Sense: R5" Successful automatic Notice detects mechanical and magical traps and ignores 2 penalty points to evade and disarm
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 5/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Dagger (d4+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (-1 2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d4+d4); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Armor Pace Penalty: -1 Pace (d6 minimum required)
Light Repeating Crossbow Strength Penalty: -1 attack
Short Sword Strength Penalty: Lowers damage to d4
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Ambidextrous: Suffers no off-hand penalty/Parry bonuses from two weapons stack
Opportunist: May attack a foe who is using Extraction during withdrawal; a foe w/out Extraction is Vulnerable
Rapid Shot: May increase ROF by 1 1/rd
Sneak Attack: Successful attack with The Drop or on Vulnerable foe inflicts +d6 damage
Uncanny Reflexes: Ignores penalty for normal Evasion; may attempt Evasion-2 for any area effect
